newsitem.title: USA: American Radio stake lifted by Baron group.
newsitem.headline: American Radio stake lifted by Baron group.

text.p: New York investor Ronald Baron said on Tuesday he and his affiliates raised their stake in American Radio Systems Corp to 2,106,800 class A common shares or 14.5 percent of the class outstanding.

In a filing with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission, Baron said partnerships that he controls bought 280,400 additional shares of American Radio between December 3 and 10 at prices ranging from $26.8438 to $27.2768 a share.
The group, which holds the shares for investment purposes, previously held 12.6 percent of the class A stock.
Baron is president of Baron Capital Management Inc, a New York-based investment firm.
